page.title: 07FLATTS FARM 1792-1985
page.content: Farmed by the{Moody Family}for{150 {years. } The{farmhouse}is{200 years}old. Machinery includes: plough, drill, tractors, combine harvester and milking machines. LAND USE -------- The farm covers{100 acres,}which are used for{wheat, barley, kale}and{ {grass. { 40 acres}are used for{feeding the {animals.}Wheat and barley are sold at {Worksop}Market. LIVESTOCK --------- Friesians At the present time there are{twenty {milking cows, 7 heifers in calf}plus{6 {small heifers. Bull}calves are sold at {Doncaster}and{Bakewell}markets when they are{2-4 weeks}old.
